kpi.name: sgsn_804a
kpi.formula: (iusm.iu_succ_pdp_con_deact_sgsn + iusm.iu_succ_pdp_con_deact_ggsn + iusm.iu_succ_pdp_con_deact_scp + iusm.iu_succ_pdp_con_deact_hlr + iusm.iu_fail_pdp_con_deact_sgsn + iusm.iu_fail_pdp_con_deact_ggsn + iusm.iu_fail_pdp_con_deact_scp + iusm.iu_fail_pdp_con_deact_hlr)

kpi_info.title: Iu NWR PDP deactivation attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of network originating PDP context deactivations to Iu interface.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(IU_SUCC_PDP_CON_DEACT_SGSN+
IU_SUCC_PDP_CON_DEACT_GGSN+
IU_SUCC_PDP_CON_DEACT_SCP +
IU_SUCC_PDP_CON_DEACT_HLR+
IU_FAIL_PDP_CON_DEACT_SGSN+
IU_FAIL_PDP_CON_DEACT_GGSN +
IU_FAIL_PDP_CON_DEACT_SCP+
IU_FAIL_PDP_CON_DEACT_HLR)

counters from table(s):p_sgsn_iu_session_mgmt
